title: my client keeps messing up in champ select
body: This happens randomly, but when I go into champ select my screen is just all black. This has been happening ever since I downloaded alpha client and I have lost over 50 lp!!!!!! because of this. After it happens once or twice I just give up and stop playing league. I dont get many chances to play but when I do this stupid problem keeps coming up. Riot please do something about this, its really frustrating. Is there something I can do to prevent it?

replies.body:
If you see a black screen when loading champion select, then a bad connection could be the culprit. Connection issues can cause a black screen since the client isn't able to grab the information from our servers without a stable connection. Follow the steps in our [Connections Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and that should narrow down the issue for you.

Feel free to hit me back if you're still having issues!
Oh okay, thanks. I've just been really frustrated with this but I still stay positive minded in my games and spread positive vibes. Mind helping me with another thing?
You're on the path to greatness by keeping a positive attitude ^_^! And sure thing, how else can I help?

I was banned over 11 months ago and I have barely touched league of legends up until about a month ago when I started playing on my smurf again. I messed up by making a very, very dumb mistake by repeating a racial slur that I was called. Literally everyday the thought of my permabanned account haunts me, and I'm not even lying when I say that. I reformed myself, I bettered myself but I still can't get Riot to help me. I just feel like I invested so much into my account and losing it all devastated me, even 11 months after what has happened. If you can do something for this account, I would be forever in your debt. Please help me.

Racial slurs are not something we take lightly on the Summoner's Rift. However, if you are sure you did nothing wrong to receive a ban, you can always reach out to our support agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

I am totally against the use of racial slurs myself, I'm not a racist. Although, I do admit I did get into a little banter with my lee sin because he didn't find my april fools joke funny. I have reached the support team but I found no success, i dedicated so much time and money into the account. Maybe if you say something it can have a bigger impact. Also, this was the ONLY event in which I demonstrated "toxicity" after my 14-day ban. I had been reforming but sadly I chose to fight fire with fire instead of ignoring/muting it.
